alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 20 at 6:14PM MST until August 20 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Pinal County, West Pinal County and Apache Junction/Gold Canyon. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County
